item.title: Donna add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Love can change a person the way a parent can change a baby- awkwardly, and often with a great deal of mess." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Donna add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "When someone is in your heart, they're never truly gone. They can come back to you, even at unlikely times." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Donna add a quote by Fred Rogers
item.description: "When I say it's you I like, I'm talking about that part of you that knows that life is far more than anything you can ever see or hear or touch. That deep part of you that allows you to stand for those things without which humankind cannot survive. Love that conquers hate, peace that rises triumphant over war, and justice that proves more powerful than greed." -- Fred Rogers

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "My mother... she is beautiful, softened at the edges and tempered with a spine of steel. I want to grow old and be like her." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Donna add a quote by William Goldman
item.description: "Do I love you? My God, if your love were a grain of sand, mine would be a universe of beaches." -- William Goldman

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "If I die, I will wait for you, do you understand? No matter how long. I will watch from beyond to make sure you live every year you have to its fullest, and then we’ll have so much to talk about when I see you again… (Bones)" -- Jeaniene Frost

item.title: Donna add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "I'm my beloved's and my beloved is mine." -- Anonymous

item.title: Donna add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "Love is the only thing that we can carry with us when we go, and it makes the end so easy." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Let me tell you this: if you meet a loner, no matter what they tell you, it's not because they enjoy solitude. It's because they have tried to blend into the world before, and people continue to disappoint them." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Maybe who we are isn't so much about what we do, but rather what we're capable of when we least expect it." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Donna add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Donna add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Donna add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Weeds are flowers, too, once you get to know them." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Donna add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "I think we dream so we don’t have to be apart for so long. If we’re in each other’s dreams, we can be together all the time." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Donna add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Promise me you'll never forget me because if I thought you would, I'd never leave." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Donna add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If there ever comes a day when we can't be together, keep me in your heart. I'll stay there forever." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Donna add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "I knew when I met you an adventure was going to happen." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Donna add a quote by Winnie the Pooh Cddisn 60863
item.description: "A little Consideration, a little Thought for Others, makes all the difference." -- Winnie the Pooh Cddisn 60863

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "We can’t be lovers because we both have mustaches. But since you’re a lady, and I’m a gentleman, I’ll shave mine off." -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "Love has a shape, but no color. You’re probably wondering, “If it’s transparent, how do you know what shape it is?” Good question. Well, for one thing, I put it together, and for another, I’m currently wearing it like body armor (though to the casual observer, I appear naked). " -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Donna add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "One day spent with someone you love can change everything." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Donna add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "The best things in life make you sweaty." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Donna add a quote by William Goldman
item.description: "Sonny, don't you tell me what's worthwhile--true love is the best thing in the world, except for cough drops. Everybody knows that." -- William Goldman
